amendment.description: To provide a reserve fund for bold energy legislation that is deficit neutral.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3136 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3136 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S2230-2231, S2249, S2250-2251; text: CR S2230) To provide a reserve fund for bold energy legislation that is deficit neutral.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3136 proposed by Senator Conrad.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3136 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
